mapper.sql: SELECT ps.pr_no, ps.item_seq, ps.srv_seq, ps.srv_nm, ps.srv_cd, ps.unit_cd, ps.qty FROM agt_prservice ps
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agt_prservice ( pr_no, item_seq, srv_seq, srv_nm, srv_cd, unit_cd, qty ) SELECT dp.e4u_pr_no, dps.item_seq, dps.srv_seq, dps.srv_nm, dps.srv_cd, dps.unit_cd, dps.qty FROM agt_dum_pr dp INNER JOIN agt_dum_pritem dpi ON ( dpi.erp_pr_no = dp.erp_pr_no ) INNER JOIN agt_dum_prservice dps ON ( dps.erp_pr_no = dpi.erp_pr_no AND dps.item_seq = dps.item_seq ) WHERE dp.erp_pr_no = #{erpPrNo}
INSERT INTO agt_prservice ( pr_no, item_seq, srv_seq, srv_nm, srv_cd, unit_cd, qty ) VALUES ( #{prNo}, #{itemSeq}, #{srvSeq}, #{srvNm}, '9999', 'SET', 1 )
